#summary Key Components: Overlay

[https://awe6.googlecode.com/svn/tags/api/types/awe6/interfaces/IOverlay.html https://awe6.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/images/icons/overlay.png]

At the very top of the visual pile is the Overlay.  It's the chrome, the border, the panel, the window.  By default the Overlay handles pause, mute and back button functionality.

== Things you should know about Overlay ==

  * [https://code.google.com/p/awe6/source/browse/trunk/app/src/awe6/core/Overlay.hx Overlay] comes ready to run (it's created automatically in the default [ComponentFactory Factory]).
  * The Overlay is always visible.
  * Implements [https://awe6.googlecode.com/svn/tags/api/types/awe6/interfaces/IOverlay.html IOverlay].
  
== Did you know? ==

  * Additional Overlay buttons can be added by extending [https://code.google.com/p/awe6/source/browse/trunk/app/src/awe6/core/Overlay.hx Overlay] and using [https://awe6.googlecode.com/svn/tags/api/types/awe6/interfaces/EOverlayButton.html EOverlayButton.SUB_TYPE].
